title: On Father's Day, My CEO Son Asked, "Dad, Do You Like The $8000 Marcus Sends You?"

alternatives.text: At My Retirement Party, My VP Son Asked, "Dad, Who Paid Your $6000 Medical Bills?"
On My 70th Birthday, My Executive Son Said, "Dad, Wasn't It Nice of Derek to Fix Your Roof?"
At Thanksgiving, My Director Son Asked, "Dad, Do You Appreciate The $7500 Kevin Gives You?"
On Father's Day, My Manager Son Asked, "Dad, Aren't You Grateful For What Brian Does?"
At My 65th Birthday, My Corporate Son Asked, "Dad, Do You Thank Raymond For The $9000?"
On Father's Day, My Wealthy Son Asked, "Dad, Does Jerome's $8000 Help With The Bills?"
At Christmas, My Executive Son Asked, "Dad, Do You Like The $5000 Check From Wallace?"
On My Retirement Day, My CEO Son Asked, "Dad, Did You Thank Preston For The $7000?"
On Father's Day, My VP Son Asked, "Dad, Wasn't It Generous of Carl to Send $6000?"
At My 68th Birthday, My Director Son Asked, "Dad, Do You Appreciate Marcus's $8000?"

original.formula: [Sacred family bond] + [Sacred holiday] + [Specific money] + [Third party revelation]
